summary: Rival gang leaders are locked in a struggle to become the new chairman of Hong Kong's Triad society.
cast: Simon Yam|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Louis Koo|Nick Cheung|Ka Tung Lam|Eddie Cheung|Suet Lam|Tian-Lin Wang|Bing-Man Tam|Maggie Siu|David Chiang|Yong You|Chung Wang|Shao-Peng Chen|Bun Yuen|Ting Yip Ng|Ronald Yan|Raymond Ho-Yin Wong|Robert Hung|Hsin Shen|Paul Che|Fung Kwok|Chi Wai Wong|Chi-Shing Chiu|Sze Yan Wong|Wen-Wei Lin|Han-Chou Ho|Pui Chung Tong|Chu Ho|Bo Yuen|Jonathan Yat-Sing Lee|Chi-Ping Chang|Jackson Ha|Wing-Cheong Law|Wai Kit Pang|Kin-Yung Tsang|Wah-Wo Wong|Sai Tang Yu
title: Election
